Title: La vengeance d'une femme
Writer: Jacques Doillon (scenario and dialogue), Jean-François Goyet (scenario and dialogue), Fyodor Dostoevsky (inspiration)
Actors: Isabelle Huppert, Béatrice Dalle, Jean-Louis Murat, Laurence Côte
Plot: Suzy, a beautiful woman, is coming back to Paris to attend the funeral of her lover, a married man. Cecile, his wife, is holding Suzy responsible for his suicide. By finding Suzy in Paris, Cecile is trying to seek the truth by playing a psychological game on her.
